target_platform.description: The platform for which the server profile is applicable. It can either be a server that is operating in standalone mode or which is attached to a Fabric Interconnect managed by Intersight. * `Standalone` - Servers which are operating in standalone mode i.e. not connected to a Fabric Interconnected. * `FIAttached` - Servers which are connected to a Fabric Interconnect that is managed by Intersight.
